questions.questionText: Which of the following is the Capital of India?
questions.explanation: New Delhi is the capital of India.

questions.questionText: Which of the following is a Movie?
questions.explanation: All the other options are American sitcoms.

questions.questionText: How can we find the speed of a moving object?
questions.explanation: Speed of a moving object is found by dividing the distance travelled with time taken.

questions.questionText: who is regarded as the greatest urdu language poet?
questions.explanation: Mirza Ghalib is regarded as the greatest poet of urdu language.
